name: Nightblock
description: A dark theme for Skyblock Forums.
additional_info:
Changelog:

February 11th, 2020:
- Changed timestamp, author, and post number text from purple to teal
- Changed some Recent Activity events and the "Showing threads" text from black to white
- Tabs on pages are now dark

February 10th, 2020:
- Renamed to Nightblock
- Completely redone! This isn't 100% finished, but it looks a lot better than the old version.
Credits to Material Design for the colors used in this rewrite (https://www.material.io/design/color/dark-theme.html).

August 12th, 2017:
- Initial release
